sn23.16:4.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:
sn23.16:4.3: “Sir, they speak of ‘things that entail suffering’.
sn23.16:4.4: What are the things that entail suffering?”
sn23.16:4.5: “Rādha, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are things that entail suffering.
sn23.16:4.7: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
